cases = int(input())
for i in range(cases):
    (N, rides) = map(int, input().split())
    tot_flrs = 0
    cur_flr = 0
    for j in range(rides):
        (start, end) = map(int, input().split())
        if cur_flr != start:
            tot_flrs += abs(cur_flr - start)
        tot_flrs += abs(start - end)
        cur_flr = end
    print(tot_flrs)

def read_numbers():
    inp = input()
    return [int(x) for x in inp.split()]
T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    (N, Q) = read_numbers()
    queries = []
    for _ in range(Q):
        queries.append(read_numbers())
    current = 0
    sum_ = 0
    for q in queries:
        sum_ += abs(current - q[0])
        sum_ += abs(q[0] - q[1])
        current = q[1]
    print(sum_)

T = int(input())
for tc in range(T):
    data = []
    time = 0
    data.append(0)
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split(' '))
    for _ in range(q):
        (f, d) = map(int, input().split(' '))
        data.append(f)
        data.append(d)
    for i in range(1, len(data)):

    print(int(time))

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    [n, q] = [int(j) for j in str(input()).split(' ')]
    qr = []
    for k in range(q):
        qr.append([int(j) for j in str(input()).split(' ')])
    p = 0
    i = 0
    d = 0
    while i < q:
        d = d + abs(p - qr[i][0])
        p = qr[i][0]
        d = d + abs(p - qr[i][1])
        p = qr[i][1]
        i = i + 1
    print(d)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    f1 = []
    d1 = []
    c = 0
    for i in range(q):
        (f, d) = map(int, input().split())
        if i == 0:
            c += f
        c += abs(d - f)
        f1.append(f)
        d1.append(d)
    for i in range(q - 1):
        c += abs(f1[i + 1] - d1[i])
    print(c)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    F = []
    D = []
    floors = 0
    for j in range(q):
        (f, d) = map(int, input().split())
        F.append(f)
        D.append(d)
    floors = F[0] - 0
    floors += abs(D[0] - F[0])
    for k in range(1, q):
        g = abs(F[k] - D[k - 1])
        floors += g
        floors += abs(D[k] - F[k])
    print(floors)

T = int(input())
R = []
for _ in range(T):
    (N, Q) = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))
    prev = 0
    ans = 0
    for _ in range(Q):
        r = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))
        ans += abs(r[0] - prev) + abs(r[1] - r[0])
        prev = r[1]
    R.append(ans)
for r in R:
    print(r)
